channel.title: Most of bm_c1a1c inaccessible due to stuck door
channel.description:
There is a door in bm_c1a1c, just after getting the weapons, that blocks access to the rest of the level. It's transparent and bulletproof. It's partway open such that I can throw grenades through it.
Somehow this thing needs to open, but the action button isn't doing it, I can't break it with anything, and the only NPC that I can get to is chilling in the security station.
